Title: Establishes a pilot hospital medical debt relief program
Summary: Establishes a three-year pilot hospital medical debt relief program to provide hospital medical debt relief to eligible residents of the state utilizing a not-for-profit organization to identify, acquire and cancel medical debt of such eligible residents directly from health care providers in the state.
LawCode: Add Art 2 Title 2-G §§245 & 246, Pub Health L; amd §601, Tax L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law and the tax law, in relation to establishing a pilot hospital medical debt relief program
